short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voxiom io is another interesting game that is a mix of battle royale and Minecraft

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voxiom.io is another interesting game that is a mix of battle royale and Minecraft. Right at the beginning, you may notice that the game resembles Minecraft graphics. You will also find similar mechanics here, such as crafting or drawing cubes. This way you can create various weapons, thanks to which you can then better defend against enemies. Or you can build a small house and use it as a shield. As this is a battle royale, your goal will be to stay alive as long as possible. When all the enemies are dead, you win. Let's do this!
